import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import'./styles.scss';import{getQuestionnaire}from'../../../../services/questionnaire/getQuestionnaire';import{Question}from'./components/Question';import{Button}from'../../../components/Button';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export const ScreeningJobSeeker=props=>{const{seekerId,associationPublished}=props;const INVOCATION=1;const[questionnaire,setQuestionnaire]=useState({});const[questions,setQuestions]=useState([]);useEffect(()=>{fetchQuestionaire();// eslint-disable-next-line react-hooks/exhaustive-deps
},[]);const fetchQuestionaire=async()=>{const params={associationPublished:associationPublished,invocation:INVOCATION,seeker:seekerId};const resp=await getQuestionnaire(seekerId,params);const questionsData=resp.data.data[0].sections[0].questions;setQuestions(questionsData);setQuestionnaire(resp.data.data[0]);};const handleSubmit=()=>{const questionnaireId=questionnaire._id;console.log(questionnaireId);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"jobseeker-screening-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"container-heading",children:"All mandatory Questions are marked with"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"screening-questions-container",children:questions.map((question,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Question,{question:question,questionNum:index+1},question._id))}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"submission-section",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{onClick:handleSubmit,children:"Submit Response"})})]});};
